description: This file defines abstract classes and static methods related to temperature monitoring in a hardware or embedded system context. It declares an interface 'mfrImpl' with virtual functions for getting and setting temperature thresholds and states, and a 'mfr' class providing static accessors and mutators utilizing a static implementation pointer.

classes.name: mfrImpl
classes.description: Abstract interface class for temperature management, with virtual methods to get/set temperature thresholds and retrieve current temperature states.

classes.name: mfr
classes.description: Provides static interface to static implementation for temperature management; ensures singleton-like access.

methods.name: mfr::setImpl
methods.description: Sets the static implementation instance used by the mfr class.

methods.name: mfr::mfrGetTempThresholds
methods.description: Static method to retrieve temperature thresholds.

methods.name: mfr::mfrSetTempThresholds
methods.description: Static method to set temperature thresholds.

methods.name: mfr::mfrGetTemperature
methods.description: Static method to get current temperature states.
